about.title: About
about.subtitle: Here you will find information about me, such as my experience and skills within programming.
info-description: I am a professional passionate about building applications, with experience in IT since 2019. I completed my degree in Systems Analysis and Development in 2020 and since then I have worked in several areas of the IT area, both as Quality Assurance and as a Developer.

As a Developer, I participated in the modernization of an investment platform for a large bank, working with Angular (versions 8 and 12), Jasmine, Jest, Oracle CMS, CloudBees and Google Analytics. My experience includes developing robust solutions and integrating with modern tools and technologies.

In my role as Tester, I was responsible for creating and executing test cases, using tools such as HP ALM and Octane, in addition to applying BDD (Behavior-Driven Development) techniques to ensure quality in agile development environments.
I am looking for new opportunities that allow me to contribute my skills, learn and grow professionally. If you know of a position that aligns with my experience and goals, I would be happy to talk.
